reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great conditioning and a luscious scent
reviews.reviewText: This conditioner is a great one that will leave your hair feeling soft and smelling great all at a great price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have thick hair and one or 2 pumps of this conditioner is enough to get all the tangles out. It leaves my hair soft and less frizzy.it smells great too !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’ve tried a lot of expensive brands, but I always come back to this. It works so well, smells incredible, moisturizes my hair, and is a great value for the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is my kids favorite. Smells great and makes your hair soft

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Muti-purpose hair conditioner!
reviews.reviewText: I am so glad that this product is still being made. This conditioner has so many uses. I use it as a pre-poo, a co-wash, as well as a leave-in. It is good for travel because it serves all these purposes without all the bottles. Of course, it is excellent for its intended use, which is to condition and detangle the hair. I like its coconut scent, which is subtle enough for me. When I use it as a leave-in, it does not flake and provides definition for my hair too, so it can be used as a styler if I'm pulling my hair back. If I'm using it as a styler and my hair is loose, I put a gel on top for hold. It works well with other styling products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dry tangled hair be gone!
reviews.reviewText: I have curly, fine, tangly, medium density 3c/4a hair. Years ago I tried to use this conditioner as a detangler, but it seemed to aid in the tangles, but in recent years I’ve also learned that for my hair less is more. I no longer an heavy handed with products, layer or use oil on my hair ( just scalp). This conditioner with water melts my tangles away and moisturizes my hair. I don’t think I’ll ever be without it! I’ve spent hundreds trying to find products that work. I’ve use drugstore products as well as salon. I’m now at the point I will use what works for MY hair and not jump on the newest trend. The conditioner is thick and a little goes a long way. I found that it is best when activated with water. It’s cost effective and it works!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well on my very curly hair
reviews.reviewText: I like the scent and it works well to keep my very curly hair less frizzy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality for price, my favorite inexpensive conditioner!
reviews.reviewText: I have really long hair and tend to use a *lot* of conditioner in the shower. I’m always looking for less expensive products that still work well since getting the fancy stuff is just way too much money given the quantity that I’m using on a regular basis. This is one of my favorite brands/products that I’ve found in my years of experimenting, and definitely the best value-for-price option; in my experience it’s better than the other brands I’ve tried at the same price. It might not make my hair quite as soft & smooth as some of the slightly more expensive products, but it works well enough that most of the time I would rather have this for the lower price, especially with my thrifty-college-student budget. There was a while I couldn’t find it in stores and I’m super happy I’ve found it on Amazon, and in the large container version too!
I like how good this is for my hair.
Best shampoo for my hair. I been using this for years and never had any issues. This Herbal shampoo takes care of my hare and skin all the time.

reviews.reviewTitle: Excellent for detangling and as a leave-in
reviews.reviewText: I've used Herbal Essences Hello Hydration for many years.I do believe the formula changed slightly over the years but it's still a great conditioner if you want it to be a breeze to detangle. I have high density 3b waist-length curls.Not only do I use Hello Hydration conditioner to detangle but I also use it as a leave-in. My curls pop and last for a week.

reviews.reviewTitle: Well worth it and lasts forever
reviews.reviewText: I’ve used this product for ages because my hair is unruly and very easily becomes tangled. This product has a lot of “slip” as they say on YouTube. Well worth it and lasts forever. It has helped me prevent hair loss.
